tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a race condition in the asynchronous user engagement collection. The `appendSpan` and `collectUserEngagement` methods do not correctly await asynchronous calls, leading to improper execution order. This flaw can result in unexpected behavior, data inconsistencies, or incomplete tracking during user engagement processing.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@genkit-ai/firebase` library to the patch version.
